name: NoCLIP Chapter 1
description:
The red crystal, the god of destruction, escaped from what kept him sealed with a glitch and corrupted the whole world.

it's up to you to use the same glitches and seal him away with the help of the green crystal

the game's soundtrack : https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLQB74mUN_nY9PMahpyWEdQ51gqTRnkrIX

if you are italian here's the game's devlogs: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLQB74mUN_nY8g3uo3lS0s0WTsAHcaajmH
